name: warpcorrect
description:
Replaces voxels in a deformation field that point to a specific out of bounds location with nan,nan,nan.

This can be used in conjunction with the warpinit command to compute a MRtrix compatible deformation field from non-linear transformations generated by any other registration package.

References:
author: David Raffelt (david.raffelt@florey.edu.au) & Max Pietsch (mail@maxpietsch.com)

inputs.name: marker
inputs.description: single value or a comma separated list of values that define out of bounds voxels in the input warp image. Default: (0,0,0).

inputs.name: tolerance
inputs.description: numerical precision used for L2 matrix norm comparison. Default: 9.99999975e-06.

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.
